message.name: INF_NO_EVIDENCE_FOUND_FOR_CASE
message.locale: No Evidence Records found for the case %1s.

message.locale: No Case record found for the specified CaseID: %1s

message.locale: From date value can't be empty

message.name: TO_DATE_NOT_NULL
message.locale: To date value can't be empty

message.name: DATE_RANGE
message.locale: Date range entered is not valid. To date should be same or later than the from date

message.name: NO_CASE
message.locale: Cases not found for the given case Type '%1s'
